title: Vintage Denim Jacket
description: Classic vintage denim jacket in excellent condition. Perfect for layering in all seasons. Slightly oversized fit with authentic distressing.

title: Floral Summer Dress
description: Beautiful floral pattern summer dress. Light and flowy material, perfect for warm days. Only worn once for a photoshoot.

title: Premium Leather Sneakers
description: Minimalist white leather sneakers. Premium Italian leather with comfortable insoles. Minor signs of wear on the soles.

title: Cashmere Sweater
description: Luxurious 100% cashmere sweater in a beautiful emerald green. Very soft and warm. Barely worn and in excellent condition.

title: High-Waisted Mom Jeans
description: Trendy high-waisted mom jeans with a relaxed fit. Light blue wash with subtle distressing. Perfect vintage-inspired look.

title: Silk Blouse
description: Elegant silk blouse in a beautiful cream color. Perfect for office or evening wear. 100% silk material with mother of pearl buttons.

title: Vintage Band T-Shirt
description: Authentic vintage Rolling Stones tour t-shirt from the 90s. Well-worn with character but in good vintage condition.

title: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Genuine leather crossbody bag in a versatile tan color. Multiple compartments and adjustable strap. Some patina from use adds character.

title: Linen Blazer
description: Lightweight linen blazer perfect for summer. Unstructured fit with minimal lining for breathability. Neutral beige color that goes with everything.

title: Platform Doc Martens
description: Classic black Doc Martens with platform sole. Broken in but still in excellent condition. Vegan leather version.

title: Pleated Midi Skirt
description: Elegant pleated midi skirt in a vibrant emerald green. Elastic waistband for comfort. Perfect for office or special occasions.

title: Chunky Knit Cardigan
description: Oversized chunky knit cardigan in a warm oatmeal color. Perfect for cozy fall and winter days. Large wooden buttons and patch pockets.

title: Strappy Summer Sandals
description: Minimalist strappy sandals with low heel. Genuine leather in a versatile cognac color. Comfortable for all-day wear.

title: Patterned Silk Scarf
description: Vintage inspired silk scarf with geometric pattern. Vibrant colors and high-quality silk. Perfect accessory for any outfit.

title: Wool Coat
description: Classic wool coat in camel color. Timeless design with double-breasted front. Warm and elegant for winter.

title: Cotton Jumpsuit
description: Comfortable cotton jumpsuit in olive green. Casual yet stylish with adjustable waist tie. Perfect for everyday wear.

title: Statement Earrings
description: Bold geometric statement earrings in gold tone. Lightweight despite their size. Add instant style to any outfit.

title: Canvas Tote Bag
description: Durable canvas tote with leather handles. Spacious interior with small pocket. Perfect everyday bag.

title: Tailored Trousers
description: Classic black tailored trousers with slight crop. Perfect fit with stretch for comfort. Versatile for work or evenings out.

title: Striped Sundress
description: Light and breezy sundress with blue and white stripes. Cotton material with button-down front. Perfect for beach days.
